Special containment procedures:
must be incased in 6 layers of soundproof foam at all times.

Description

On the outside it looks like a box where you would cast a vote, but every month it takes over all broad casting in a 10 mile area and exclaims what will be voted on. These topics range from world war 4 too ice cream rain too 
■■■■■■■■■■■■■■.
 Anything else about this box is unknown.
title: The Infinite Voting Booth
